description: The institute has a dedicated training and placement cell which is actively working towards providing students with placement opportunities as well as professional training. The recruiters at SVECW include some of the biggest names in the industry such as Accenture, Capgemini, Hyundai Mobis, Infosys, TCS, IBM, HCL, Hexaware, Cognizant, Flipkart, Wipro, Adobe, Amazon, L&T, Mahindra, and several others.
In the 2016-2020 batch, a total of 789 students have been placed so far at the above-mentioned companies with Capgemini and Accenture being the top recruiters.

Section.name: About SVECW
Section.description:
Shri Vishnu Engineering College for Women is a was founded by Sri Vishnu Educational Society in 2001. The college is affiliated to Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University (JNTU), Kakinada since 2011 and was accredited in 2008 by NBA for 5 years. The college offers Bachelor and Master Courses in various field of Technology. It also offers Professional Programme in Business and Computer Application.
SVECW has been chosen as the Best Consumer of APEPDCL in West Godavari District for use of alternative energy resources. The college has also been granted autonomous status by UGC. SVECW has an area of 100 acres consists of building, residence, auditorium, playgrounds, colleges or parking. The institute was awarded the Global Performance Excellence Award by Asia Pacific Quality Organization (APQO) on 15th October 2012
The institute offers the following courses along with the respective specializations:

SVECW AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.

SVECW Placement
The institute has a dedicated training and placement cell which is actively working towards providing students with placement opportunities as well as professional training. The recruiters at SVECW include some of the biggest names in the industry such as Accenture, Capgemini, Hyundai Mobis, Infosys, TCS, IBM, HCL, Hexaware, Cognizant, Flipkart, Wipro, Adobe, Amazon, L&T, Mahindra, and several others.
In the 2016-2020 batch, a total of 789 students have been placed so far at the above-mentioned companies with Capgemini and Accenture being the top recruiters.
Read more: SVECW Placement
